original: sems bskyed pa'i rkyen @147b bzhi'i bsdus pa'i don ni /
analyzed: sems bskyed pa'i rkyen @147b bzhi'i bsdus pa'i don ni /
translated: The meaning of the four conditions for generating the Thought is as follows:

original: byang chub sems dpa'i rigs nges pa sems bskyed pa'i rkyen gnyis dang / byang chub tu gyur pa'i sems bskyed pa'i rkyen gnyis so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i rigs nges pa sems bskyed pa'i rkyen gnyis dang / byang chub tu gyur pa'i sems bskyed pa'i rkyen gnyis so //

analyzed: slob pa dang mi slob pa zhes bya ba'o //

original: sems bskyed pa dang / ci ltar 'tsham par sbyar ro //
analyzed: sems bskyed pa dang / ci ltar 'tsham par sbyar ro //
translated: One should apply them in whatever way is appropriate.

original: rgyu bzhi'i bsdus pa'i don la /
analyzed: rgyu bzhi'i bsdus pa'i don la /
translated: The meaning of the four causes is as follows:

original: rgyu gsum ni chos nyid kyis thob pa dang / phyi rol gyi gzhan gyi sgra'i mtshan ma las dang / nang gi tshul bzhin yid la byed pas bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: rgyu gsum ni chos nyid kyis thob pa dang / phyi rol gyi gzhan gyi sgra'i mtshan ma las dang / nang gi tshul bzhin yid la byed pas bsdus pa'o //

original: de yang rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: de yang rnam pa gnyis te /

analyzed: gzhan sdug bsngal las bsgral bar 'dod pa dang / bdag gi rgyud du gtogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyis mi 'jigs pa nyid de /
translated: the desire to liberate others from suffering and the fearlessness with regard to the suffering that is included in one's own life-stream.

original: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal skye ba la sogs pa dang / dka' ba spyod pas sdug bsngal na yang tshogs gnyis kun nas sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal skye ba la sogs pa dang / dka' ba spyod pas sdug bsngal na yang tshogs gnyis kun nas sogs pa'o //
translated: Even though there is suffering in the life-cycle, such as birth, and even though there is suffering in the practice of austerities, the two stores are completely accumulated.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i rigs phun sum tshogs pa ni chos nyid kyi sa thob pa yin par rig par bya'o zhes bya ba 'di ni rigs phun sum tshogs pa'i dbye ba yod pa'i rgyu rab tu bstan pa'i don du gsungs so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i rigs phun sum tshogs pa ni chos nyid kyi sa thob pa yin par rig par bya'o zhes bya ba 'di ni rigs phun sum tshogs pa'i dbye ba yod pa'i rgyu rab tu bstan pa'i don du gsungs so //
translated: The perfection of the bodhisattva's spiritual gene should be understood as the attainment of the stage of Dharma-determined nature. This is stated in order to demonstrate the reason for the division of the perfection of the spiritual gene.

original: blun po ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni lhan cig skyes pa'i shes rab dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: blun po ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni lhan cig skyes pa'i shes rab dang ldan pa'o //

original: yid rtul ba'i rang bzhin can ma yin zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: yid rtul ba'i rang bzhin can ma yin zhes bya ba ni /

original: myur du 'dzin par nus pa'o //
analyzed: myur du 'dzin par nus pa'o //

original: mkhas shing zhes bya ba ni thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: mkhas shing zhes bya ba ni thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab dang ldan pa'o //
translated: Skilled means being endowed with the wisdom that comes from listening.

original: mdzangs pa ni bsams pa las byung ba'i shes rab dang ldan pa nyid do //
analyzed: mdzangs pa ni bsams pa las byung ba'i shes rab dang ldan pa nyid do //
translated: Wisdom is the possession of the wisdom that arises from reflection.

original: bshes gnyen phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa bzhi'i bsdus pa'i don ni /
analyzed: bshes gnyen phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa bzhi'i bsdus pa'i don ni /
translated: The meaning of the four kinds of perfection of the spiritual teacher is

original: shes rab phun sum tshogs pa dang / sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa zhes bstan to //
analyzed: shes rab phun sum tshogs pa dang / sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa zhes bstan to //

original: sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam pa gsum ste /
analyzed: sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam pa gsum ste /

original: nyon mongs pa spyod pa las ldog par sbyor ba dang / mi dge ba'i las kyi lam ldog pa la sbyor ba dang / dge ba'i las la nus pa dang ldan pa gong ma gong ma'i khyad pa la sbyor ba ste /ğŸ”½bag med pa'i gnas la nye bar sbyor ba dang / nyes par spyod pa la rnam par sbyor pa dang / shin tu dman pa la dad pa dang / 'dun pa dang / dam 'cha' ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi @148a * //

translated: application to the cessation of the practice of the addictions, application to the cessation of the paths of the nonvirtuous actions, and application to the higher and higher excellences of the virtuous actions.

analyzed: thabs dang / yon tan du khas len pa la sogs pa'i gnyen por rig par bya'o //

analyzed: rgyu bzhis byang chub sems dpa' snying rje ba'i shas che bar 'gyur te /

original: rgyu bzhi'i bsdus pa'i don ni /
analyzed: rgyu bzhi'i bsdus pa'i don ni /

original: de la gang gis sdug bsngal zhes bya ba ni gzhan rnams bdag gam gnyi ga'am gzhan yang ji ltar rigs par sbyar ro //
analyzed: de la gang gis sdug bsngal zhes bya ba ni gzhan rnams bdag gam gnyi ga'am gzhan yang ji ltar rigs par sbyar ro //
translated: Here, those who are the cause of suffering are others, oneself, both, or others as appropriate.

analyzed: rang bzhin gyis snying stobs che zhing brtan pa dang ldan pas stobs dang ldan pa yin zhes bya ba la /

original: bstan pa ni dman pa'i sems nyon mongs pa bzhin du nges par spong ba ste /
analyzed: bstan pa ni dman pa'i sems nyon mongs pa bzhin du nges par spong ba ste /

analyzed: thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab dang ldan pa'o //

original: yang dag par sems pa'i ngang tshul can zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: yang dag par sems pa'i ngang tshul can zhes bya ba ni /

original: bsams pa las byung ba'i shes rab dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: bsams pa las byung ba'i shes rab dang ldan pa'o //
translated: he has the wisdom that comes from reflection.

original: gang la so so sor rtog pa'i stobs yod pa de ni so sor rtog pa'i stobs dang ldan pas 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal la mi 'jigs pa'o //

analyzed: gzhi'i rgyu'i bsdus pa'i don ni gang la mi 'jigs pa dang / rgyu gang gis mi 'jigs pa dang zhes bya ba ste /

original: snying stobs dang ldan pa dang / so sor rtog pa dang ldan pa dang / rgyu gang gis byang chub las mi g-yo ba dang / sems can gyi sdug bsngal bsal bar 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: snying stobs dang ldan pa dang / so sor rtog pa dang ldan pa dang / rgyu gang gis byang chub las mi g-yo ba dang / sems can gyi sdug bsngal bsal bar 'dod pa'o //
translated: endowed with courage, endowed with discernment, not turning away from enlightenment by any cause, and desiring to remove the suffering of sentient beings.

original: sdug bsngal gyi rgyu bzhi'i bsdus pa'i don ni /
analyzed: sdug bsngal gyi rgyu bzhi'i bsdus pa'i don ni /

analyzed: sdug bsngal ji snyed yod pa dang / sdug bsngal ji ltar yod pa'o //

analyzed: de la ji snyed yod pa ni yun ring ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //

original: de las gzhan pa rnam pa gsum ni ji ltar yod pa'o //
analyzed: de las gzhan pa rnam pa gsum ni ji ltar yod pa'o //
translated: The other three types of suffering are the manner of suffering.

original: de yang rnam pa gsum ste /
analyzed: de yang rnam pa gsum ste /
translated: Moreover, that is threefold:

original: sna tshogs pa nyid dang / drag pa nyid dang / bar chad med pa nyid do //
analyzed: sna tshogs pa nyid dang / drag pa nyid dang / bar chad med pa nyid do //
translated: variety, intensity, and uninterruptedness.

original: stobs bzhi'i bsdus don ni rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: stobs bzhi'i bsdus don ni rnam pa gnyis te /

original: dge ba'i chos goms pa dang / rgyud du gtogs pa'o //
analyzed: dge ba'i chos goms pa dang / rgyud du gtogs pa'o //
translated: the cultivation of virtuous qualities and the inclusion of the continuum.

original: rgyud du gtogs pa yang rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: rgyud du gtogs pa yang rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: The inclusion of the continuum is also twofold:

original: bdag dang gzhan gyi bye brag gis so //
analyzed: bdag dang gzhan gyi bye brag gis so //

original: dge ba'i chos @148b la goms pa yang rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: dge ba'i chos @148b la goms pa yang rnam pa gnyis te /

analyzed: 'das pa'i dus kyi dang / mthong ba'i chos kyi dus kyi dbye bas so //

original: byang chub sems dpa' dang po sems bskyed pa bstan pa'i ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos 'jig rten dang thun mong ma yin pa'i bsdus pa'i don ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' dang po sems bskyed pa bstan pa'i ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos 'jig rten dang thun mong ma yin pa'i bsdus pa'i don ni /
translated: The summary of the chapter on the bodhisattva's first production of the thought of enlightenment, which is a teaching of the marvelous and supreme Dharma, not shared by worldlings, is as follows:

original: sems can thams cad chung ma ltar yongs su 'dzin na yang nyon mongs pas mi gos pa ni skye mched phun sum tshogs pa'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad chung ma ltar yongs su 'dzin na yang nyon mongs pas mi gos pa ni skye mched phun sum tshogs pa'o //
translated: Even though he takes care of all beings as if they were his wife, he is not defiled by the addictions. This is the perfection of the sensemedium.

original: de nas sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pas bsam pa dang sbyor ba phun sum tshogs par byas nas dge ba'i chos skyed cing spel lo //
analyzed: de nas sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pas bsam pa dang sbyor ba phun sum tshogs par byas nas dge ba'i chos skyed cing spel lo //
translated: Then, by the perfection of application, he perfects his will and application, and he generates and increases the virtuous qualities.

original: de nas 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa'o //
analyzed: de nas 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa'o //

analyzed: yang 'bras bu'i khyad par bsdus pa'i don ni /

original: dang po sems khyad par du 'phags pa'o //
analyzed: dang po sems khyad par du 'phags pa'o //

original: dang po sems bskyed pa'i le'u 'di'i bsdus pa'i don ni /
analyzed: dang po sems bskyed pa'i le'u 'di'i bsdus pa'i don ni /
translated: The summary of the meaning of this chapter on generating the mind for the first time is as follows.

original: dang po sems bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid dang / khyad par gyi mtshan nyid dang / rgyun mi 'chad par sems bskyed pa'i rkyen bzhi dang / rgyu bzhi dang / rgyu dang stobs gang dag gis sems bskyed pa bstan pas de'i mi mthun pa las ldog pa dang /

analyzed: dang po sems bskyed par bsten pa'i ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos dang / de'i phan yon ni rang gi mtshan nyid dang / khyad par gyi mtshan nyid dang / skye ba'i rgyu dang rkyen dang stobs dang / de la rmongs pa rnams la bstan pa dang /
